name: Hold Time
description:
Fight time and try to reach your goal without getting too frustrated or old.

Butterflies appear where bad things happen.

Put on some music that makes you calm and try getting to the end.

Use a X-box controller for best experience.

Align your sticks with the handles on any ticking clock to bust it (WASD + IJKL on keyboard).

Jump with any of the two top shoulder buttons (space on keyboard).
